mapper.select: SELECT conf_name AS confName, AVG(execute_time) AS executeTime FROM low_code_bot_node_conf_execute_log group by conf_id order by executeTime;
SELECT conf_name AS confName, count(*) AS count FROM low_code_bot_node_conf_execute_log group by conf_id order by count desc;
SELECT conf_name AS confName, MAX(execute_time) AS count FROM low_code_bot_node_conf_execute_log group by conf_id order by count;
